A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply my least favorite star wars to date (Behind even the prequels). The plot felt forced at times\, Leia apparently has a new force power that both Jedi and Sith master beforehand could never seem to grasp\, Luke has his character morphed into a shell of what the entire series has built him to be\, and thirty minutes of time was wasted on a casino planet that ultimately was useless to the story (for characters that felt hollow). The movie was very visually striking\, but overall a disservice to long-time Star-Wars fans that left glaring plot holes and more desired from a storytelling aspect. Not to mention everything about Snoke was unanswered and his death made little sense (if he was some ultra powerful Sith master\, why couldn't he notice such a simple move?)
